表格会员记录表的代码预览

drop index 客户与会员记录_FK on viplist;

drop index 会员与会员等级关系_FK on viplist;

drop index viplist_PK on viplist;

drop table if exists viplist;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: viplist */
/*==============================================================*/
create table viplist
(
id int not null,
mid int,
clientno varchar(50),
integral float(10),
jiontime date,
sumjf float(10),
primary key (id)
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: viplist_PK */
/*==============================================================*/
create unique index viplist_PK on viplist
(
id
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 会员与会员等级关系_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 会员与会员等级关系_FK on viplist
(
mid
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 客户与会员记录_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 客户与会员记录_FK on viplist
(
clientno
);

alter table viplist add constraint FK_会员与会员等级关系 foreign key (mid)
references member (mid) on delete restrict on update restrict;

alter table viplist add constraint FK_客户与会员记录 foreign key (clientno)
references client (clientno) on delete restrict on update restrict;
